definitions: An organized physical activity or program designed to be participated in by a group of people from a particular local area or community, often with the aim of promoting health, social interaction, and well-being.
A collective effort or activity undertaken by members of a community to achieve a common goal, often involving physical exertion or skill development.
examples: The park hosts a weekly community exercise class.
Our town's community exercise program improved local health.
Participation in community exercise fosters social bonds.
